ER_DUP_ENTRY.message: It looks like you have already added this [error_context] to your MyYoast account.

rest_user_invalid_email.message: The email you provided could not be used. It is likely already in use by another account.

rest_invalid_param.message: The information you provided in the [invalid_param] field appears to be invalid. Please check whether everything is in order.

learndash_course_not_enrolled.message: The user is not enrolled in this course.

learndash_course_already_started.message: The currently enrolled student has already started this course. You cannot enroll a new student to a course that has been started.

learndash_course_already_enrolled.message: That student is already enrolled in this course.

rest_user_invalid_password_confirmation.message: Password confirmation does not match the new password

rest_user_weak_password.message: Your password is not secure enough. Please try to include more numbers and letters, and make sure it does not contain your email or name.

password_too_long.message: Your password is too long. You may use up to 128 characters for your password.

invalid_user_login_for_password_reset_re.message: The email address you provided is not known to us. Please try again with a different email address.

invalid_key.message: This link no longer valid. Please try to request another password reset email.

GENERAL_SUPPORT_ERROR.message: Oops, something went wrong on our end, please try again. If this keeps happening, [customer_support_link]

invalid_user_login_for_login.message: Incorrect credentials provided. Please check that your email and password are entered correctly.

incorrect_password.message: Incorrect credentials provided. Please check that your email and password are entered correctly.

user_email.message: The email address you provided has already been used. Please try another email address.

user_name.message: That email address has already been used. Please check your inbox for an activation email. It will become available in a couple of days if you do nothing.

invalid_google_authenticator_token.message: Your verification code is incorrect or has expired.

signup_email_blocked.message: You cannot use that email address to sign up. We are having problems with them blocking some of our email. Please use another email provider.

signup_email_reserved.message: That email address has already been used to sign up. Please check your inbox for an activation email. It will become available in a couple of days if you do nothing.

signup_email_invalid.message: Please enter a valid email address.

signup_email_already_used.message: The email address you provided has already been used. Please try another email address.

signup_email_not_allowed.message: Sorry, that email address is not allowed!
